title: #Pirates 3 - Feminist pirates
body:
Gangplank è stato sgominato e la sua ciurma ora serve un altro capitano. Indovinate da chi?
[trascrizione artigianale, perdonate se c'è qualche errore]

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MwUUDypEDNQ

_I once met a lass so fine
She was drunk on Barley Wine
I'd been to sea for months a three
I knew I could make her mine
And the lass was past consent
So it was off with her we went
And we threw her in bed
And rested her head
And we left 'cause that's what gentlemen do_

_A woman has a right to a drink or two
Without worrying about what you will do
We say 'yo ho' but we don't say 'ho'
Because 'ho' is disrespectful, yo_

_There was once a girl from Leeds
Who I heard was good on her knees
So I docked my ship for an overnight trip
To take care of all my needs
She was fine as the tales did tell
And my mast began to swell
So I laid her down and raised her gown
And performed cunnilingus for an hour or so_

_Always take care of your lady fair
'cause they deserve as much attention down there_

_We say 'yo ho' but we don't say 'ho'
Because 'ho' is disrespectful, yo_

_I once had a woman so fair
Whose womb contained my heir
With a son by my side
The seas we'd ride
The child she would bear
But my girl she was no fool
She was working her way through school
So I did support when she chose to abort
Because it's her body and therefore her choice_

_No we don't say booty 'less we talkin' about gold
We don't look at chest 'less it's a treasure hold
With a hat and a feather and a cutlass on our hip
We will never say 'she' when we're talkin' 'bout our ship
We don't say 'bitch' and we don't say 'whore'
'cause that language leads to things like body dysmorphia_

_There was a lady with a golden eye
And the doctor said she would die
So she emptied her purse to lift the curse
And prayed to stayed alive
She awoke the very next day
Hand in her grave she lay
But the scariest part of the story from the start
It's I bet you assumed the doctor was a man_

_Women are doctors too
And for a fraction of doubloons_

_We say 'yo ho' but we don't say 'ho'
Because 'ho' is disrespectful, yo_

[#Pirates 1 - Leave Her, Johnny.](http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/it/c/discussioni-generali-it/JupbYgE3-pirates-1-leave-her-johnny)
[#Pirates 2 - Fifteen men on a dead man's chest!](http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/it/c/discussioni-generali-it/3Uhv1kri-pirates-2-fifteen-men-on-a-dead-mans-chest)

replies.body: Oh questa Ã¨ una canzone da pirati rozzi e liberi!
